Override.entitydescription.stungunnew: A device for firing electrified darts. \nNOTE: Requires the user to continously "aim" at the target to shock them.
Override.entitydescription.stungundartnew:
A dart with little hooks to sink deep into one's skin to incapacitate for arrest. Non-lethal. 
 
- Lasts 12.5 seconds. 
- Loses charge completely when detached. 
- Can be retrieved. 
- Can be recharged.
Override.entitydescription.stungundartfulgurium:
A highly potent stun gun dart that will drop any would-be creep like a sack of potatoes. 
 
- Lasts 8 seconds. 
- Quickly immobilizes small targets. 
- Loses charge completely when detached. 
- Can be retrieved. 
- Can be recharged.
